import React, { Component } from 'react' import '@fortawesome/fontawesome-free/css/all.css' import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css' import './Quic.css' import ScoreCard from './ScoreCard/ScoreCard'; export default class Quick extends Component { state = { headcount: 0, headcountProc: 0, eHeadcount: 0, eHeadcountProc: 0, productivity: 0, productivityProc: 0, eProductivity: 0, eProductivityProc: 0, availability: 0, availabilityProc: 0, shrinkage: 0, shrinkageProc: 0 } componentDidMount() { this.getHeadcount(); } getHeadcount() { fetch('/api/users/prodsummary') .then(res => res.json()) .then(({ headcount, headcountProc, eHeadcount, eHeadcountProc, productivity, productivityProc, eProductivity, eProductivityProc, availability, availabilityProc, shrinkage, shrinkageProc }) => this.setState({ headcount, headcountProc, eHeadcount, eHeadcountProc, productivity, productivityProc, eProductivity, eProductivityProc, availability, availabilityProc, shrinkage, shrinkageProc })) } render() { return (
) } }
